dataIdInfo.idPurp: The purpose of this tool is to calculate the spatiotemporal density of user-uploaded photos from the Flickr social media platform that represent a cultural ecosystem service such as natural landscapes, wildlife, etc. This tool uses advanced machine learning algorithms borrowed from the computer vision literature in order to automatically recognize and classify a desired feature (e.g. nature) from a data repository of images.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: The purpose of this tool is to calculate the spatiotemporal density of user-uploaded photos from the Flickr social media platform that represent a cultural ecosystem service such as natural landscapes, wildlife, etc. This tool uses advanced machine learning algorithms borrowed from the computer vision literature in order to automatically recognize and classify a desired feature (e.g. nature) from a data repository of images.
